otp.subheading: Insert the code you recieved in your email inbox:

CTA.title: The best part? You can start right now!

tagline1.title: Stick to your budget
tagline1.text: Find the right service for every price range. No hourly rates, just prices based on each project.

tagline2.title: Receive quality work quickly
tagline2.text: Hand over your project to a freelancer in just a few minutes and get results that will last forever.

tagline3.title: Pay when you're satisfied
tagline3.text: An advance quote means there are no surprises. Payments are only released when you are satisfied with the service.

SellerCTA.heading: Become a Seller with Uenji today!
SellerCTA.subheading: It's easy as one, two three!
SellerCTA.step2: Fill-in the details to become a seller
SellerCTA.step3: Publish your gigs and make money!

personalInfo.heading: Personal Info
personalInfo.subheading: Tell us a bit about yourself. This information will appear on your public profile so that potential clients can get to know you better.

displayName.heading: Display Name
displayName.subheading: In order to help you create credible and authentic connections with your customers, you will need an introduction name. We suggest you use your first name and the first initial of your surname.

profilePhoto.heading: Profile Photo
profilePhoto.subheading: Add a profile photo of yourself so that clients know exactly who they are working with.

description.heading: Description
description.subheading: Tell us about yourself. This information will appear on your public profile so that potential clients can get to know you better.

languages.heading: Languages
languages.subheading: Select the languages you can communicate in and your level of proficiency.

professionalInfo.subheading: This is your moment to shine. Let potential clients know what you do best and how you acquired your skills, certifications and experience.
professionalInfo.heading: Professional Info

occupation.heading: Occupation
occupation.subheadingPart3: of your best skills in this field

skills.heading: Skills
skills.subheading: Indicate the skills related to the services you will be offering and include your level of experience.

education.heading: Education
education.subheading: Add any relevant education details that will help customers get to know you better.

certifications.heading: Certifications
certifications.subheading: Include any certificates or awards that are relevant to the services you offer.

accountSecurity.heading: Account Security
accountSecurity.subheading: Trust and security are very important in our community. Please check your e-mail address and cell phone number.

title.heading: Gig Title
title.subheadingPart1: The title of your gig works as a storefront into your service, as such
title.subheadingBold: it is the most important part
title.subheadingPart2: to put key information that your future clients will be searching for.
title.inputValidation: Title is required for Gig creation

searchTags.heading: Search Tags
searchTags.subheading: Label your gig with keywords that are relevant to the services you offer. Use up to 5 keywords to stand out.
searchTags.keywordsSubheading: Enter the keywords you think your buyers will use when searching for your service.

description.title: Gig Description
description.subtitle: Briefly describe your gig
description.hoverTextPart1: This is your time to be creative.
description.hoverTextPart2: Describe what you are offering. Be as detailed as possible so that potential buyers might understand if your service will be able to meet their requirements. Must be at least 120 characters.

faq.title: F.A.Q.
faq.subtitle: Answer some common questions about your gig that might help buyers understand your service.

Gallery.title: Gallery
Gallery.subtitle: Add images or documents to showcase your work
Gallery.disclaimer: In order to abide by Uenji's Terms of Service, make sure that you only upload content that belongs to you or that you have permission or hold a license to use.

images.title: Images (up to 3)
images.subtitle: Grab your prospective client's attention by showcasing visual examples of your work.

documents.title: Documents (up to 2)
documents.subtitle: Documents help give your work more credibility

Orders.title: Orders
Orders.subtitle: Manage your orders
Orders.noOrders: You don't have any orders yet
